add_notify_dialog.stylesheet: QDialog { background-color: #1e1e1e; color: #ffffff; font-family: 'Segoe UI'; } QLabel { color: #ffffff; font-weight: 500; } QLineEdit, QTimeEdit, QDateEdit, QComboBox { background-color: #2e2e2e; border: 1px solid #444444; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px; color: #ffffff; font-size: 12px; } QLineEdit:focus, QTimeEdit:focus, QDateEdit:focus, QComboBox:focus { border-color: #0d7377; } QComboBox::drop-down { border: none; background-color: #444444; border-radius: 2px; width: 16px; } QComboBox::down-arrow { image: none; border: 1px solid #ffffff; border-top: none; border-right: none; width: 5px; height: 5px; margin: 2px; } QComboBox QAbstractItemView { background-color: #2e2e2e; border: 1px solid #444444; border-radius: 2px; color: #ffffff; selection-background-color: #0d7377; } QPushButton { background-color: #2e2e2e; border: 1px solid #444444; border-radius: 4px; padding: 4px 8px; color: #ffffff; font-weight: 500; min-width: 40px; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #3e3e3e; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #1e1e1e; } QPushButton:checked { background-color: #0d7377; } QGroupBox { font-weight: 500; border: 1px solid #444444; border-radius: 4px; margin: 4px 0; padding-top: 5px; } QGroupBox::title { subcontrol-origin: margin; left: 8px; padding: 0 3px; }

notify_list_dialog.reminder_done_message: Reminder '{reminder}' completed and added to archive.
